title: Write suggest-prevention.md command
description: Create command to check error catalog before starting tasks and suggest preventions. Extracts task keywords, searches catalog for matching error prevention keywords, ranks by severity and recurrence_count, displays top 3 warnings with symptoms and prevention steps.
notes: Created suggest-prevention.md command for proactive error prevention. Implements 6-step process: load task, extract keywords (technology/operation/domain), search catalog (scoring: keyword match +1, category match +2, severity multiplier, recurrence bonus), rank by score, display top 3 warnings with symptoms/prevention/checks, return structured JSON. Includes detailed/summary/compact modes, confidence levels, and related error detection.
